Text: Now this is more like it! All the imperials I can punch!
That's the spirit! Let's not let her put us to shame!
Never did the thought cross my mind, my lord!
Hold fast, warriors of the Steppe! We can defeat them!
There it is! The ovoo! We are not too late!

Gosetsu had the right idea!
I'll keep them busy─the rest of you, keep moving!
Thank you, Lyse! With me, Hien, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Claim the ovoo for the Mol
Defeat Magnai the Older and hold back the Oronir
Defeat Sadu Heavensflame and hold back the Dotharl
Claim the ovoo for the Mol
Destroy the stellar chuluu
Defend the stellar chuluu
Prevent the Oronir from claiming the ovoo
Prevent the Buduga from claiming the ovoo
Prevent the Dotharl from claiming the ovoo
Defeat the sham shinobi
Defeat the vanara
Defeat Ostyrgrein
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! That you should fall against such feeble opposition...
Come! Let us warm the deck...with blood!
This is but part of your training. Finish them swiftly, my pupil.
When outnumbered, use Oka or Mangetsu to smite multiple foes in one fell swoop.
You're tough, I'll give you that! But how will you fare against my pet?
Feeding time, my pretty!
Hmph, 'tis a fiend who resorts to using a fiend. The beast is yours, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
The false shinobi, you may leave to me.
That beast is a lumbering thing. You can easily anticipate and evade its attacks.
Yes, that's the way!
There, I have tended to my part. Hurry and tend to yours.
Nooo! My beautiful pet!
No more games! Time to unleash...the samurai!
Right then, let's take some heads.
Finally, the last act of this gaudy circus.
This man is but a pretender who knows not how to hold a blade.
I should be surprised were he to offer you any trouble.
I'll show you a samurai trick or two!
Such a clumsy stroke. Seeing it fair makes mine eyes bleed.
You'd do better to try and cut down a fly.
Try this!
Slinging mud!? You have no honor!
Shite on your honor! Winning's all that matters!

You were no samurai, but neither are you a gladiator.
Nay, you are naught but a craven.
Th-This can't be right...
Nooo! It's not supposed to play out like this! Th-The banquet is over!
Come, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! We give chase!
Shut your mouth, you old bastard!
B-Bugger this! Time to use the secret weapon!
Find Arya
Defeat Lilith and stop the ritual
We must rescue Arya before it is too late!

Swift and sure!
We've no time for subtlety!
Cut through these pests!

I've felt that insidious aura before...
Lilith is here!

Meddlesome vermin! The vessel is mine!
The alignment is not perfect...but it shall suffice.

No! That light...
She means to force the transference!

Venom. Just as we anticipated.
Now's the time to use that antidote!

\\<hiss> Wretched mortals...
I will sup upon the marrow of your souls!

Do you feel that chill!?
It was the same with Lambard...

For centuries have I planned this moment!
Your skulls will adorn my throne!

Our failure to perish appears to have upset her.
Keep wearing her down!

\\<hiss> You think me beaten?
Infernal flames of the void! Consume these worms!

She summons fiery spheres as did Lambard!
No...this is worse. So much worse.

Dammit...
Arya...forgive me...

Sniveling...pestilent...MAGGOTS!
All the children of man shall suffer for mine imprisonment!

Victory is in our grasp!
Let us slay this monster and take Arya home!

\\<hiss> Yes, the power... I am born anew!
I shall cast your kind into pits of vilest torment!

<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Something wicked this way falls!
Ritual progress
Clear the storage compound
Dismantle the magna roader
Clear the testing compound
Defeat Subject Number XXIV
Clear the central compound
My cup runneth over with lightning and ice!
My cup runneth over with fire and lightning!
My cup runneth over with ice and fire!
Let the balance be shattered and all fall to ruin!
What fortune to receive such a promising test subject...
This way, little one, this way. Time for your medicine...
Hm. Well. We have data enough. We will learn from this.
Systems nominal... Powering magitek engines...
Deactivating limiters... Injecting ceruleum fuel additives...
Emergency restart! Systems unstable... Evacuate...
Have your fill, little one. My medicines are plentiful.
Systems critical! Unable to execute Wild Speed Protocol...
Hostile presence detected. Subject Number XXIV, engaging arcane combat mode.
Commencing fire aether loading.
Commencing ice aether loading.
Commencing lightning aether loading.
System restored. Recommencing fire aether loading.
System restored. Recommencing ice aether loading.
System restored. Recommencing lightning aether loading.
XXIV Protocol initiated. Commencing fire attack.
XXIV Protocol initiated. Commencing ice attack.
XXIV Protocol initiated. Commencing lightning attack.
Inhibitors disengaged. Fire aether output level maximum.
Inhibitors disengaged. Ice aether output level maximum.
Inhibitors disengaged. Lightning aether output level maximum.
Warning: fire aether overload. Combat system throttled; defensive functions impaired.
Warning: ice aether overload. Combat system throttled; defensive functions impaired.
Warning: lightning aether overload. Combat system throttled; defensive functions impaired.
Aether loading test complete... Urgent redesign required...
Defeat Musosai
My blade scours as a snowstorm!
Frozen blade, come into bloom!
Blade of fury, as one with the wind!
Blade of calm, graceful as dance!
The storm amidst the calm!
Storms gather, blossoms scatter!
Unlike before, this is no game.
It ends only when one of us lies dead.
Defend yourself, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
\\<grunt>
N-Not now... Not to illness...
\\<pant> I am not finished yet...
Fight, ObjectParameter(1), ,1)>! Fight...or you will die!
Ungh...
How strong you have grown, my pupil.
Your training shall soon be complete. I am glad.
Now, for my greatest test...
The technique for which I earned my name!
Death comes!
Well done, my pupil!
We are come to the end. I shall bring my all to bear, and so shall you.
Hold nothing back. Do you hear me?
Drawing upon my blade's power, I shall call forth violent winds.
Show me the fruit of your training, and weather it.
No, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! You cannot fall...not when you are so close!
Defeat the masked marauders.
Defeat Dorgono.
Come, warriors! Show us your mettle!
With pleasure! You will rue the day you crossed blades with us!
Come now, is that all you marauders can muster?
Gah! I'm afraid my strength is spent... Forgive me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
They are too strong. My apologies, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
We're...we're losing? How can this be?
Raaaaaargh!
I fear she is lost to her inner beast now. We must do whatever it takes to stop her.
Stay your blade, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. She appears to have calmed down.
It's no use... We cannot stop her...
No one will stand in my way! No one!!!
The very earth beneath her trembles! Fall back, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
I will rend the flesh from your bones!
Brace yourself! I fear there is no escaping this onslaught!
Defeat Shiden
Defeat the traitorous Sekiseigumi
Defeat Shiden
Let me show you something I learned from Lord Ugetsu.
Bleed from a thousand cuts!
My brilliant blade pierces all!
No...  I cannot lose... Not to a traitor...
I knew that we needed to be rid of you, but I had not expected to do the deed myself.
You were my favorite, Makoto. This gives me no pleasure.
And I respected you, Shiden...
It is not too late. Join me and swear fealty to Lord Ugetsu!
Never! I will fight you to my dying breath!
Hmph, you did always have a stubborn streak. This time it will be the end of you.
I should have killed you off long ago, as I did the others.
All those assassinations were your doing!? Damn you, Shiden!
No punishment will suffice for your crimes!
To arms! To arms!
What's this?
We are come to aid you!
Kami be praised─it's the Sekiseigumi!
My friends, we are betrayed! The lieutenant serves Ugetsu!
You arrived just in time.
Sir!
What? What is happening?
Come now, surely you did not think I was alone?
No... This cannot be...
These two have uncovered our plan.
They are a threat to the cause and cannot be suffered to live. Kill them.
Yes, sir! For the cause!
That there should be so many traitors...
Please, open your eyes!
Tearing down the bakufu will only lead to chaos!
We are Sekiseigumi! We are sworn to protect the nation!
What you are doing is...is wrong!
There's far too many of them!
We cannot win against these odds...
Are there none who are loyal?
That it should end like this...
Quickly! They're this way!
That voice... Could it be!?
Forgive me my delay. It took some while to gather those on duty.
C-Captain! You're alive!
There are traitors in our midst, the lieutenant among them!
Aye, I know. 'Twas he who tried to kill me.
Th-That was Shiden, too!?
Hmph, aren't you a tough old bastard?
Why, Shiden? I trusted you.
To change Hingashi, why else? But mule-headed as you are, I don't expect you to understand.
The earnest and true Shiden of old is no more─that is all I need to understand.
We deal with the traitors! Have care, and remember:
We are the Sekiseigumi, and our blades stand for peace!
Come, ijin. I shall be your opponent.
I am done toying with you. Let us see your true worth!
\\<gasp> No... How could I lose?
Lord Shiden is fallen! We must retreat!
You'll not get away!
Leave them! We cannot risk endangering the citizens.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, forgive me... I am undone...
Defeat Nayaga.
I will make you pay for what you've done to the Qerel!
Hmph! It is time you learned your place.
We've done it, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! We've done it!
None can deny the will of the Dusk Mother! Hahahaha!

Oh Nhaama, goddess of the dusk. Grant me strength to do
your bidding, to nourish the soil with their life's blood.
What's this!? He's repelling our attacks!
It is the power of Karash! To land a blow against him now is nigh impossible.
This is the limit of your power? How pathetic, hahahaha!
Is there nothing we can do?
The answer lies with Karash. If I can harness all my strength into a single strike...
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, keep his attention. I need a moment to focus my energies.
You would be the first to die? Very well.
I fear my strength alone may not be enough...
Never fear, my love! You need but say the word, and my axe is yours.
Then let us combine our strength and put an end to his rampage.
My soul is aflame─I've never felt so alive! Could this be the power of love?
Oh no! Mammoths!
Back, you fiends! Can you not see I'm assisting my ladylove? <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, you must stop them!
He's summoned more mammoths! You cannot allow him to disrupt our formation.
Hold on, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. We're nearly there. I can feel it!
Take my love, Dorgono. Take it, and lead us to victory!
You mean to intimidate me with that pitiful ball of flame?
This is the true power of Karash, of our inner beasts.
And together, we are unstoppable!!!
Gaaaaaaaaahhhhhh!!!
My strength... No, this cannot be happening...
We've breached his defenses. We must strike now before he can recover.
Leave it to me, my dear!
You will not deny the Dusk Mother.
It would be my pleasure.
Defeat Ugetsu
My blade shall reduce you to dust!
I am one with the twilight moon!
A rain of blades to shroud the moon!
In snow and in bloom, my blade sings for my nation!
Let us fight, pupil to pupil.
Such nostalgic bladework... There is no doubting under whom you trained.
But no amount of Musosai's training will grant you victory over me.
For I have transcended our master!
You have learned well. 'Tis plain you will not fall so easily.
For you, I shall call upon my true strength. Steel yourself!
You are surpassing strong, that much I allow.
But I have a mission─a vision to realize. I will give Hingashi true peace...
And until I accomplish this, I cannot fall!
No... So much...undone...
Lord Ugetsu...defeated!? Impossible!
Victory is mine. A new day dawns upon the realm.
Arrive at the Third Armory
Defeat the magitek rearguard
Arrive at the Training Grounds
Defeat the magitek hexadrone
Arrive at the Hall of the Scarlet Swallow
YOU...WILL...DIE!
THIS TIME...THIS TIME I...
BOOOOOOM!
WE GO TOGETHER!
DIE DIE DIE!
Arrive at the Keisen Garden
Defeat Zuiko-maru
Arrive at the Budokan Training Grounds
Defeat Dojun-maru
Arrive at the Noh Theater

I am the blade of vengeance.
They dare only whisper my name─Yojimbo.
I want them dead, you hear me? Dead!
If you desire my strength, you must pay my price.
Come, Daigoro! It is time to collect what is ours.
More gold!? B-But I've already... Fine! Just take care of them!
Quickly, Daigoro. I would have every coin.
Back, Daigoro!

They still stand. Impressive...
Kageyama! If you would have their heads, I require more gold.
You cannot be serious! ...L-Let me check my coffers.
Worthy opponents indeed. I will not insult you by holding back any longer.
Here. Another payment, as you asked. Now get rid of them!
I only do as I am paid to do.
Come, Daigoro!
Take it! Take it all and bring me their heads!
Go, collect what is ours.
How!? How are they still standing!? This isn't what I paid for!
If their price for their lives is beyond your reach, that is not my concern.
No, I will not stand for this! I paid for their heads and I shall have them!
You will have what your coin is worth, nothing more.
No... No! You have to kill them!
This is all you would pay me? Very well...
Your payment is noted. Now, see what your coin has purchased.
You have paid me well. Such a sum is deserving of my full strength!
How generous. For such a sum I would rend the very heavens!
Behold, the sword art of legend─Zanmato!
Let my blade sing once more!
Open your heartsss to me!
A sssliver of grace I bequeath to you...
My grace, my beauty, my everything...is yours...
I shall free you from your hate!
Do you not long for releassse from this pain?
There is no place for you within our dream...
Only the faithful may know joy everlasssting...
Sssurrender to blisss...
Ressst your weary sssouls in my bosom.
Partake of my life and my love...
Look on the love you have forsssaken...
Drink of me and cast out these tainted of light!
Decriers! Defilers!
Hearken to me, my dreamers!
Who are you to wake them from the dream...
Defeat Ser Ompagne
Hold nothing back, you three! Show me your all!
You heard the man, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! With me!
Is that the best you can do? Hmph. Maybe this will help!
They're going after Rielle! Help her, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!

You swore an oath, Sid, did you not?
What will happen if you fail to uphold it?
I can't break free! Save Rielle, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Death awaits those who walk this path alone, Sid...
Ugh! You never were one to hold back...
Sid! Sid! Are you all right!? Hold on!
Not bad, not bad. But how will you handle this?
Never take your eyes off your charge, Sid! Remember!
Godsdammit, not again! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, help Rielle!
If it wasn't for <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, you'd be dead by now...
Gah... He's right. That's one more I owe you...

Well done, you two! You have exceeded all expectation!
Consider this your reward!
You thrice-damned son of a─ Graaagh!
Sid! Speak to me! Sid!
I am still your opponent! Defend yourself!
Strength is pain! Suffering! Sacrifice!
Think me merciless? Your enemies will be no kinder!
Am I...so weak...
I'm sorry, Sid...<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>... I'm sorry...
Magnificent, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. Fray would be proud...
We're still here, old man! What else have you got!?
Defeat the simulacra
Use Souleater to become whole
Ours is the greatest lie of all. We have to end it.
But you, boy, I deny! Yours is the coward's way!
We deal with the dross, then the boy. A simple plan.
You know my heart! It bleeds like any other!
These scars and sins are ours to bear─not to deny!
He's grown too weak to summon more shades!
On a throne of bone <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> waits...
Dug deep for those magnificent bastards, didn't you?
But lest you forget, we bested them before!
Why...why won't they answer...
The chorus falls silent...and the abyss...
Finish it, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Use Souleater!
Reclaim the last of your aether! Make us whole!
No, no, no...that is not how this story goes...
A reckoning...will not be...
I remember every face. They are watching and waiting...
Look on the faces of your victims! They are legion!
Again and again and again you kill. Do you feel nothing!?
Pursue the phantom faerie!
The faerie and Kuribu have fused together. Defeat the resulting amalgamation!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, Landenel─after the faerie!
Where's it going? ...Is it trying to lead us somewhere?
Keepers of ancient Amdapor, no doubt! Let us quickly finish them off!
Begone with you! It's the faerie we're after!
Look─it's just atop those steps! We must hurry and topple these things!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, fall back and provide us cover! Landenel, on your guard─it comes!
Is it...waiting for us?
Search for the black dragon!
Protect Orn Khai by defeating Faunehm!
Attack Faunehm's wings!
It may actually be Faunehm this time. Let us hurry!
It is her. I am sure of it!
Graaagh! Faunehm, why...?
Weaken Faunehm!
I will draw her attention while you attack!
Do not falter, Warrior of Light. She is weakening!
Withdraw with an elusive jump while I go in for another attack!
You have done well! Allow me to draw her attention once more.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, I cannot continue to bear the brunt of her attacks!
I am glad it is you by my side.
Keep at it, Azure Dragoons!
Faunehm, please! We mean you no harm!
Do not give up! We must get through to her.
I am almost ready to unleash my roar.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, come to my side! I shall heal you.
Accumulated Aether
The powers of the gods are mine to command!

The heavens are too small a field for our dance.
Let us transcend this mortal coil!

This day we shall write a new legend, my friend!
This battle shall echo in eternity!
Come to me, hero! I will show you the extent of my power!
Yesss! Let us shed all limits! Only then shall our legend be complete!
Open the gates of the Ala Mhigan Quarter
Head to the Resonatorium
Defeat Fordola rem Lupis
Follow my lead. Stay close and quiet.
Wait! Patrol. Let them pass...
All clear. With me!
That the last of them? Good. Let's keep moving!
Sentry! Get to cover! I will deal with him...
And none were the wiser... Let us press on.
Not one for stealth, are we!? Finish them quickly!
Here we are... Ah, one more sentry. Give me a moment.

Rather more eventful than I expected, but here we are...
Ah, one more sentry. Give me a moment.

Hells open, heavens weep...
Alphinaud, can you hear me? The gates are open!
Remember the Reach! Remember the towers! Attack!
Our friends are ready and eager to engage the imperials!
Then let us leave them to it and head for the facility!
Insurgents!? Here!? Sound the alarum!
We don't have time for this! Put them down!
Hold on, Krile... We're coming...
The Resonatorium is just ahead!
They know we're coming. Make ready, my friends!
I can read your every move!
Use the siphon, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Use it now!
Gah! Seven hells, my head... The pain!
It's working! Strike now, while she's weak!
Out of my way!
Dammit, she won't stay down! Use the siphon again!
Graaagh! You'll...you'll pay for that...
Keep at it! We almost have her!
Thancred! Help me hold off those soldiers!
Understood! We leave the pilus in your capable hands!
Heh heh heh... So it's to be the two of you after all...
Let's finish this!
If only you knew the power!
How much more can she take!?
Everything you've got and more, you stupid cow!
Not here, not now... Not to you...

<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, look for a lever or a winch!
We will guard the rear!
Enemy sighted, engaged with the commander! With me!
Still got that siphon, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!? Then use it!
Let the show begin! And it won't be a happy ending for you.
You are not worthy of calling yourself shinobi.
You cannot strike what you cannot see!
Quiver in fear before my might!
You call that ninjutsu? Witness the true skill of a master!
Gah! Just die already, you unworthy mongrels!
Ngh! I cannot fail...to the likes of...you...
Urk! This wasn't...in the...script...
Defeat Hanzo!
See through Hanzo's illusions and defeat him!
Let the revels begin!
How our hearts sing in the chaos!
Wild and pure and forever free!
REJOICE!
Resilient souls! I salute you!
Hark you to the tumultuous heavens!
Now cometh our part! Make way!
Earth and stone at our beck and call!
